item.title: Carrot - All your shopping, organized like magic
item.description: Can‚Äôt keep track of the stuff you want to buy? Meet Carrot, the extension that automatically collects your carts as you shop. You can get back to products with a click, create shareable and gift-able collections, get price drop alerts, and it's totally free!

item.title: Pilot - Payroll, benefits, and compliance for remote teams
item.description: Pilot provides payroll, benefits, and compliance for US-based companies with remote teams. Easily onboard and pay employees in 160+ countries and contractors in 240+ countries. Offering special pricing for Product Hunt users: pilot.co/producthunt
item.content:encoded: Pilot provides payroll, benefits, and compliance for US-based companies with remote teams. Easily onboard and pay employees in 160+ countries and contractors in 240+ countries. Offering special pricing for Product Hunt users: pilot.co/producthunt

item.title: The Battle of Mars - A player vs player NFT game
item.description: The Battle of Mars is a PVP NFT game where you can challenge each other and take your opponent's Martian away. 1. Mint a Martian (10,000 unique martians available) 2. Join a crypto faction 3. Challenge a friend and take their Martian away
item.content:encoded: The Battle of Mars is a PVP NFT game where you can challenge each other and take your opponent's Martian away. 1. Mint a Martian (10,000 unique martians available) 2. Join a crypto faction 3. Challenge a friend and take their Martian away

item.title: Albert - Cybersecurity awareness on Slack for your team

item.content:encoded: Albert teaches cybersecurity basics to your team over Slack. The courses are short, dynamically customized for each employee, interactive, and sent all year long. That's why your team will love it.

item.title: ZeroBlur - Blur sensitive information and share screen with confidence
item.description: ZeroBlur is a 100% free Chrome extension to quickly blur sensitive information. Stop worrying about leaking sensitive data when delivering a product demo or a sales call. In few clicks you'll be able to blur any element or page area of any web app or website.

item.title: Forte¬≤ - Build habits, not streaks
item.description: Forte¬≤ is here to help you track your progress as you build new habits or quit old ones. Unlike other habits trackers, Forte¬≤ doesn't set you back to zero for missing one day; Forte¬≤ gives you a score for each habit instead of just counting streaks.
